Reviews.Content: Would Not Recommned Hotel Nazionale There was no elevator, and no offer of help with the bags was made. The included breakfast consisted of warm instant orange juice (Tang), instant coffee, and some bread. The room was quite small, and the bathroom was even smaller. Spray from the shower could not be contained within the shower compartment.The room was very overpriced.The location, however, is quite good, so one presumes that is what one is paying for because you don't get much else.
Reviews.Author: TheObserver
